	var maxAttachments = 3; 
    var attachmentCount = new GlideAggregate('sys_attachment');
    attachmentCount.addQuery('table_name', 'incident');
    attachmentCount.addQuery('table_sys_id', current.table_sys_id);
    attachmentCount.addAggregate('COUNT');
    attachmentCount.query();

    if (attachmentCount.next()) {
        var count = parseInt(attachmentCount.getAggregate('COUNT'));
        if (count >= maxAttachments) {
            gs.addErrorMessage('Maximum number of attachments allowed is 3');
            current.setAbort(true);
        }
    }
})(current, previous);
